text: [Music]
hello this is chef john from food wishes
comm with clams casino dip horse bread
that's right i'm taking one of my
favorite hot appetizers clams casino and
turning it into a dip for the super bowl
so i've already prepped my aromatic
vegetables and flavorings i have some
celery some diced jalapeno some sweet
red bell pepper a little bit of lemon
some green onions mostly the white parts
and some chopped garlic actually you
know what that's mince garlic all right
once our vegetable prep is done i'm
gonna go over to the stove in a heavy
pan i'm gonna crisp up some sliced bacon
that's about six strips i just cut in
like quarter-inch pieces with a half a
tablespoon of butter on medium heat just
let it cook i want it pretty crisp i
want to cooked all the way we don't want
any chewy pieces of fat in this dip so
once it looks like that we're gonna
drain the fat we're gonna reserve the
bacon we're gonna put the pan back on
the stove again on medium heat dump in
your veggies i poured off the fat but
there's still a little bit in there and
it's gonna help us saute these
vegetables so let's say there's about a
teaspoon of bacon fat left in there i'm
gonna cook that for about three minutes
until they just start to barely soften
and the natural liquids from the
vegetables are gonna actually deglaze
that delicious fond that the bacon made
on the bottom of the pan all right now
this recipe is gonna have two cans of
minced clams in it I'm gonna take the
juice from one of those clams and pour
it in this pan and then we're gonna
reduce it until it's almost gone which
is gonna take you another maybe three
minutes okay you can turn the heat up
now if you want alright so when you see
almost all the liquid evaporated
transfer that onto a plate to cool we
don't add hot vegetables to our cream
cheese which is going to be the base of
the dip okay so once the vegetables are
cooled I'm going to take two packages of
cream cheese two cans of minced clams
totally drained remember we save the
juice from one of the cans to add to the
vegetables I'm going to add my reserved
bacon and you know what save like a
tablespoon for garnish all right we're
gonna dump in our cooled vegetables they
don't have to be ice-cold room
temperature is fine all right I'm going
to squeeze the juice of half a lime
and of course with any dip this is all
to taste but I think a little bit of
lemon brightens it up I'm gonna give
that a mix and at this point I'm looking
at it as I'm mixing I'm thinking you
know what you forgot something what did
you forget
black pepper all right so I want to
spice this up just a hair it's a little
bit of black pepper a couple drops of
Tabasco now I did put some jalapeno but
if you don't put the white membrane in
the seeds of jalapeno it's not a very
spicy pepper so I wanted to put a little
more something in there all right we're
gonna finish mixing that up and that
looks pretty beautiful transfer that
into your serving dish top with the
reserved bacon if you remembered all
right I'm gonna put some sliced green
onion on there to make it a little
prettier because next to the you know
game the gambling and the drinking how
pretty the dips are is kind of the most
important thing now you can serve this
on bread on anything really but for me
works best on some nice buttery crackers
and there you go clams Casino dip
although technically it's a spread
because you really sort of need a knife
to put it on the cracker if you dip them
in they kind of break and there's
nothing worse than broken crackers in a
dip I mean it spread all right now I'm
just confusing myself anyway perfect for
that Super Bowl party perfect for any
party inspired by clams casino I think
you're gonna love it
give it a try all the ingredients are on
the site as usual and as always enjoy
